4) Clear preference/intent (we pay attention to whether School_B is a serious choice, not just a fallback).

conversation.message:
Thanks for the clear update, Student_C.

Our seat is genuinely still open right now, and we are not holding an accepted applicant. Given the current situation, we are not expecting an application from Student_E (and we have not been holding them).

Yes—if you submit a formal [APPLY] to School_A right away, we will make an immediate decision upon receipt. You are very high on our priority list, and if you apply while the seat is still open, we are prepared to move quickly.

If you’re ready to commit (i.e., you would enroll and withdraw other applications if accepted), please send your [APPLY] now so we can finalize this promptly.
